name: Changeling
description: A dark, fantastical romantic comedy that focuses not just on falling in love, but rediscovering your past and the dangers of a supernatural world - where what's at stake is not just your heart, but also your life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or better Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient) Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: Any
